results:
Based on the search results, I found information about "Podróże Guliwera" (Gulliver's Travels) in Polish with references to translator Maciej Słomczyński and publishing houses Bellona and PIW. Here's what I found:

## Publication Information

Polskiego przekładu tego utworu dokonał m.in. Maciej Słomczyński. This confirms that Maciej Słomczyński was indeed one of the translators of "Podróże Guliwera" into Polish.

### Bellona Publishing House
The search shows that Wydawnictwo Bellona has published "Podróże Guliwera", with both physical and e-book versions available. The Bellona edition has ISBN 9788311152267, was published in 2018, has 300 pages, and features a hardcover format (13.0x20.0cm).

### PIW (Państwowy Instytut Wydawniczy)
The search results reference a PIW edition: "Jonathan Swift, Podróże Guliwera, Państwowy Instytut Wydawniczy", though the specific publication date isn't clearly indicated in the results.

### Additional Translation Information
The search reveals that Słomczyński's translation was titled "Podróże do wielu odległych narodów świata", and there was also a translation by Jan Kott, which was described as "poprawionym tłumaczeniem Anonima z 1784 roku" (an improved translation of an anonymous 1784 version).

The search results confirm that both Bellona and PIW have published Polish editions of "Podróże Guliwera," with Maciej Słomczyński being one of the notable Polish translators of this classic work by Jonathan Swift.
